mapper.select: SELECT bt.id AS bt_id, bt.t_name, bt.status AS bt_status, bt.create_time, bt.update_time FROM `bk_type` bt INNER JOIN `bk_type_info` bti ON bt.id = bti.bt_id WHERE bti.bk_id = #{bkId}
SELECT status, COUNT(ser_id) AS `num` FROM `bk_detail` WHERE bk_id = #{bkId} GROUP BY status
